verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to go where
The rivers cannot overflow me,
Where my feet are on a Rock;
I want to hide where
The blazing fire cannot burn me,
In Your presence, O God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to hide where
The flood of evil cannot reach me,
Where I'm covered by Your blood;
I want to be where the schemes
Of darkness cannot touch me,
In Your presence, O God.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
In Your presence,
That's where I am strong,
In Your presence,
O Lord, my God;
In Your presence,
That's where I belong,
Seeking Your face,
Touching Your grace,
In the cleft of the Rock
In Your presence, O God.
